column1: Age 18 years or older
Age between 18 and 65 years
Age between 18 and 75 years
Diagnosis of the condition under study confirmed by a physician
Able to provide written informed consent
Willing to comply with all study procedures
Able to attend all scheduled visits
Body Mass Index (BMI) between 18.5 and 30 kg/m²
Body Mass Index (BMI) between 18.5 and 35 kg/m²
Normal kidney function
Normal liver function
Normal cardiac function
Adequate bone marrow function
Adequate renal function
Adequate hepatic function
Negative pregnancy test for women of childbearing potential
Willing to use effective contraception during the study
Stable on current medication regimen for at least 4 weeks
No major surgery within 8 weeks prior to enrollment
No participation in another clinical trial within 30 days
No history of allergic reactions to similar compounds
No significant medical history that could interfere with the study
No active infection requiring treatment
No history of substance abuse within the past year
No psychiatric conditions that could interfere with the study
Life expectancy of at least 3 months
Life expectancy of at least 6 months
Life expectancy of at least 12 months
Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group (ECOG) performance status of 0-1
Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group (ECOG) performance status of 0-2
Karnofsky Performance Status (KPS) score ≥ 70%
Measurable disease according to RECIST criteria
Documented disease progression on prior therapy
Completed prior therapy at least 4 weeks before enrollment
Recovered from toxicities of prior therapies
Willing to undergo required biopsies
Willing to provide blood samples for research
Willing to complete quality of life questionnaires
Able to swallow and retain oral medication
No contraindications to MRI or CT scans
